attributes.action: Facebook. Recognise Krusher Joule as his real name. Its how everyone knows him.
attributes.additional_details:
He has designed album sleeves for Hawkwind, Gary Moore 'Dirty Fingers', Iron Maiden, Ozzy Osbourne, Japan and Black Sabbath. Whilst still at Kerrang! His work has also included designing and editing the official Donington 'Monsters of Rock' programmes since 1986 he has also compered and DJ’d in 1994, ’95 and ’96.
1992 Krusher became co-presenter along with his Jack Russell terrier Bullseye of 'Raw Power' the UK’s only terrestrial TV rock show and voted best TV show in the Kerrang! in 1992, ’93.
attributes.background:
Krusher first came to the public's attention in 1982 when he became Art Director of the then Bible of Heavy Metal magazine Kerrang!
Before that he was a freelance designer in the music industry, producing work for Motorhead, Sammy Hagar, Uriah Heep, Gamma, Girlschool, Blondie and The Sex Pistols.

rejection.details: This isn't something that the Government or Parliament could do. You could write to Facebook directly about this.
